Name: Piece of sheet with part of a peacock
Description: This piece of fabric depicts part of the body of a peacock with a wonderful polychrome tail in green, pink, yellow, blue and white. The border shows a Greek meander in isometric perspective and is executed in the same colour scheme from underneath. The background at the top of the cloth is covered with vegetal motifs. The peacock was regarded as a symbol of eternity. The piece has been woven using the weft-loop technique.
